content:
IdentityConfigurationElement Class

In this Article

Represents an <identityConfiguration> element in a configuration file. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class IdentityConfigurationElement : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
  • IdentityConfigurationElement

Inherited Members

Constructors summary

IdentityConfigurationElement()

Initializes a new instance of the IdentityConfigurationElement class.

Properties summary

AudienceUris

Gets the AudienceUriElementCollection that is associated with this identity configuration element.
Caches

Gets or sets the IdentityModelCachesElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.
CertificateValidation

Gets or sets the X509CertificateValidationElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.
ClaimsAuthenticationManager

Gets or sets the claims authentication manager that is associated with this identity configuration element.
ClaimsAuthorizationManager

Gets or sets the claims authorization manager that is associated with this identity configuration element.
IssuerNameRegistry

Gets or sets the IssuerNameRegistryElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.
IssuerTokenResolver

Gets or sets the issuer token resolver that is associated with this identity configuration element.
MaximumClockSkew

Gets or sets the maximum clock skew that is configured for this identity configuration element.
Name

Gets or sets the name of the identity configuration element.
SaveBootstrapContext

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save the bootstrap context in claims identities and session security tokens created by the handlers configured in this identity collection.
SecurityTokenHandlerSets

Gets or sets the SecurityTokenHandlerSetElementCollection that is associated with this identity configuration element.
ServiceTokenResolver

Gets or sets the service token resolver that is associated with this identity configuration element.
TokenReplayDetection

Gets or sets the TokenReplayDetectionElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.

Constructors

  • IdentityConfigurationElement()

    Initializes a new instance of the IdentityConfigurationElement class.

    public IdentityConfigurationElement ();

Properties

  • AudienceUris

    Gets the AudienceUriElementCollection that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.AudienceUriElementCollection AudienceUris { get; }

    Property Value

    • AudienceUriElementCollection

      The collection of audience URIs that are configured for this identity configuration element.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <audienceUris> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • Caches

    Gets or sets the IdentityModelCachesElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityModelCachesElement Caches { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • IdentityModelCachesElement

      The element that configures the token replay cache and the session security token cache for this identity configuration element.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <caches> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • CertificateValidation

    Gets or sets the X509CertificateValidationElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.X509CertificateValidationElement CertificateValidation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • X509CertificateValidationElement

      The element that configures the certificate validator and its properties for this identity configuration element.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <certificateValidation> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • ClaimsAuthenticationManager

    Gets or sets the claims authentication manager that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement ClaimsAuthenticationManager { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • CustomTypeElement

      A custom type element that specifies the Type of the claims authentication manager. The type must derive from ClaimsAuthenticationManager.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <claimsAuthenticationManager> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • ClaimsAuthorizationManager

    Gets or sets the claims authorization manager that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement ClaimsAuthorizationManager { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • CustomTypeElement

      A custom type element that specifies the Type of the claims authorization manager. The type must derive from ClaimsAuthorizationManager.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <claimsAuthorizationManager> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • IssuerNameRegistry

    Gets or sets the IssuerNameRegistryElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement IssuerNameRegistry { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • IssuerNameRegistryElement

      The element that configures the issuer name registry for this identity configuration element.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <issuerNameRegistry> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • IssuerTokenResolver

    Gets or sets the issuer token resolver that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement IssuerTokenResolver { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • CustomTypeElement

      A custom type element that specifies the Type of the issuer token resolver. The type must derive from SecurityTokenResolver.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <issuerTokenResolver> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element. The <issuerTokenResolver> element registers an issuer token resolver. This can be used to resolve Issuer key identifier clauses while deserializing a SAML token.

  • MaximumClockSkew

    Gets or sets the maximum clock skew that is configured for this identity configuration element.

    public TimeSpan MaximumClockSkew { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      The maximum clock skew.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the maximumClockSkew attribute of the <identityConfiguration> element. Controls the maximum allowed clock skew when performing time-sensitive operations, such as validating the expiration time of a sign-in session.

  • Name

    Gets or sets the name of the identity configuration element.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the identity configuration.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the name attribute of the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • SaveBootstrapContext

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save the bootstrap context in claims identities and session security tokens created by the handlers configured in this identity collection.

    public bool SaveBootstrapContext { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to save the BootstrapContext; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the saveBootStrapContext attribute of the <identityConfiguration> element.

  • SecurityTokenHandlerSets

    Gets or sets the SecurityTokenHandlerSetElementCollection that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerSetElementCollection SecurityTokenHandlerSets { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityTokenHandlerSetElementCollection

      The security token handler collections configured for this identity configuration element..

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the set of <securityTokenHandlers> elements that are configured under the <identityConfiguration> element. The identity configuration element can have multiple <securityTokenHandlers> elements, each of which contains settings for a collection of security token handlers.

  • ServiceTokenResolver

    Gets or sets the service token resolver that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement ServiceTokenResolver { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • CustomTypeElement

      A custom type element that specifies the Type of the service token resolver. The type must derive from SecurityTokenResolver.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <serviceTokenResolver> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element. The <serviceTokenResolver> element registers a service token resolver. This can be used to resolve Issuer key identifier clauses while deserializing a SAML token.

  • TokenReplayDetection

    Gets or sets the TokenReplayDetectionElement that is associated with this identity configuration element.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.TokenReplayDetectionElement TokenReplayDetection { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TokenReplayDetectionElement

      The element that specifies whether token replay detection is enabled and specifies the maximum expiration period for tokens in the token replay cache.

    Remarks

    Corresponds to the <tokenReplayDetection> element that is configured under the <identityConfiguration> element.
